participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative and nostalgic, enjoys artistic activities and values childhood memories.
participant_1.background: i love new kids on the block. i take dance lessons once a week. i was born in the early 80 s. my favorite toy as a child as my lite brite.

participant_2.background: i'm a professional tennis player. i enjoy long walks with my dog. i live in a three storey house. my family is continuously growing.
